name: Airbop
description:
AIRBOP

Airbop is a VR game where you use force powers to destroy and defend against drones as you make your way through a training facility. 

You have the ability to use powers similar to those in the popular "Star Wars" franchise. Using your force grab and push abilities you must deflect or block the oncoming bullets from the drones.

This was a student project where we were required to make a VR game to get you in the flow. It was made in a short amount of time with no prior experience with VR.

Some collaboration with https://jacobrgames.itch.io/
